questions.label: What magic do you wield (aka services)?
questions.content: I cast spells in TypeScript, Rust, and Vue to conjure full-stack web experiences. Need a website or app? I've got the potions... err, solutions!

questions.label: Can you teach me how to code in my sleep?
questions.content: Not yet, but I can recommend some Lofi tunes to help you focus while learning. Seriously though, I might share resources or tips, but no coding bootcamp... for now

questions.label: How much does a project cost?
questions.content: Every quest is unique! To get a customized treasure map (aka quote), please **contact me** with your project details. I'll conjure up a personalized estimate tailored to your needs.

questions.label: What factors influence the project cost?
questions.content: Project size, complexity, technology stack, timeline, and more. **Let's discuss your project**, and I'll break down the estimated costs for you.

questions.label: Do you offer any discounts?
questions.content: Possibly! **Reach out to me** to discuss your project, and we can explore potential discounts for students, non-profits, or other special cases.

questions.label: What fuels your coding frenzy?
questions.content: Lofi beats, fantasy novels, and the thrill of solving puzzles. Also, coffee. Lots of coffee.

questions.label: Hobbies beyond coding (if that's possible)?
questions.content: Reading fantasy epics, attempting to draw fantasy creatures (emphasis on 'attempting'), and dominating in online gaming (in my dreams)

questions.label: How did you become a coding wizard at such a young age?
questions.content: Started coding at 15, and the rest is history... or a really long, nerdy story. Ask me in person, and I'll tell you over a cup of coffee (or Lofi-filled silence)
